name: Carpathian Night
description:
A tribute to retro horror platformers. 

Demo available now!

Controls:

D-Pad recommended for movement - Assign with the Horizontal(gamepad) and Vertical(gamepad) in the launcher. 

Directional Attack: Attack + Direction

Dash: Down + Jump

Directional Special Attack : Special + Direction (Dorin only)

Crouch Walk: Down-Diagonal
